titles.title: Further Additional Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act, 2025
Further Additional Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act, 2025
A bill making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 25.
